Straight Shot holds Elita, as the good news spreads.  She has a smile from =
cheek to cheek on her faceplate, as she embraces Elita and points to the ro=
om.

"Silverbolt and Torca are right!  Elita look! Rodimus is gonna make it=
, I knew he would!  See?!  What'd I tell ya?!  I told ya Tucson wasn't abou=
t ta let anyone down, he's doing it, he's bringing Rodimus back!"

Night Sh=
ift could hardly contain himself as he gives a leap for joy.

"YESSSS!!!  T=
hank Primus, there is a god out there!  That's it big guy, that's it! You s=
how those ugly aft bugs who's boss!  YEAHHH!"

Rat Trap joins in on the joy=
.

" Booyahhhh, he's don' it!  He's whoopn' bug aft in there! C'mon Wheels,=
 that's it buddy, you gettn' Rodimus back! I knew ya wouldn't let us down!"=


Quickstride could do nothing more than join in on the joy.

"Now that's w=
hat I call facing adversity.  Oh yeah, he's gonna show those ugly insects w=
ho's boss, betchya he'll have Rodimus back on his feet in no time."

Rat Tr=
ap looks back to him.

"Better be careful, remember the last time ya made a=
 bet with me?"

Quickstride gives a sheepish smirk.

"Oh yeah, I lost miser=
ably.  Okay, no bets, just positive thinking knowing that the tables are tu=
rning in our favor, finally."

Night Shift nodds.

"That's right Quickstrid=
e, the tables are turn'n and they are finally turn'n in our favor.  Keep it=
 up Tucson Prime, you bring Rodimus back'n then you show those ugly bugs wh=
o's got the edge over who."
